remarks: This theorem is in fact a copy of ~ com13 , and repeated here to demonstrate a simple proof scheme.  The number '3' in the theorem name indicates that a chain of length 3 is modified. See ~ wl-impchain-com-1.x for more information how this proof is generated.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Jul-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-impchain-com-1.3.1 $e |- ( th -> ( ch -> ( ps -> ph ) ) ) $.
wl-impchain-com-1.3 $p |- ( ps -> ( ch -> ( th -> ph ) ) ) $.
